notebooks.title: Harmonic Oscillator
notebooks.description: Build your first PathSim model: a simple mass-spring system demonstrating basic ODE simulation.

notebooks.description: Learn to create feedback loops with integrators and time-dependent sources.

notebooks.description: Model a nonlinear pendulum and use adaptive time-stepping for accurate simulation.

notebooks.title: Van der Pol Oscillator

notebooks.description: Implement a PID controller with tunable gains for setpoint tracking.

notebooks.title: Cascade Controller
notebooks.description: Design a multi-loop cascade control system with inner and outer controllers.

notebooks.title: DC Motor Speed Control
notebooks.description: Model a DC motor with coupled electrical and mechanical dynamics under PID control.

notebooks.title: Kalman Filter
notebooks.description: Implement a Kalman filter for state estimation with noisy measurements.

notebooks.title: Thermostat
notebooks.description: Model a bang-bang thermostat controller using event-driven hybrid simulation.

notebooks.description: Simulate an ABS system with coupled vehicle and wheel dynamics using events.

notebooks.title: Bouncing Ball

notebooks.description: Extend the bouncing ball with state-dependent switching behavior.

notebooks.description: Combine pendulum dynamics with collision detection at a wall boundary.

notebooks.description: Model billiard ball motion with elastic wall collisions in a circular boundary.

notebooks.title: Stick-Slip Friction
notebooks.description: Model discontinuous stick-slip friction with mode switching.

notebooks.title: Coupled Oscillators
notebooks.description: Simulate multiple coupled harmonic oscillators sharing energy.

notebooks.title: Elastic Pendulum
notebooks.description: Model a pendulum with an elastic spring connection showing complex motion.

notebooks.description: Simulate the famous Lorenz system and visualize chaotic dynamics.

notebooks.description: Use event detection to construct Poincare sections of chaotic systems.

notebooks.description: Implement a successive approximation ADC with binary search conversion.

notebooks.description: Simulate a nonlinear diode circuit using implicit equation solving.

notebooks.description: Model an amplifier with noise sources and nonlinear saturation.

notebooks.description: Integrate external FMU models using the FMI co-simulation interface.

notebooks.description: Integrate a Van der Pol FMU using model exchange mode.
